title: About Me
Directory
text:
Parcel Block Walking Neighborhoods



Housing


Mapping Tool


Internal


Yearly


In Progress



A lookup tool for neighborhoods across the City of Dallas where users can view residential parcels in different neighborhoods and lookup property owner information.



Mar 30, 2024














Homestead Exemptions in Dallas County



Housing


Mapping Tool


Internal


Yearly


In Progress



This mapping tool allows users to explore the uptake of homestead exemptions for homeowners across Dallas County, and view metrics related to home exemption uptake for eligbile households.



Feb 23, 2024














Neighborhood Eviction Housing Profiles



Housing


Fact Sheet


External


Yearly



A neighforhood fact sheet lookup tool that provides users with the ability to review idenfied housing and eviction metrics in neighborhoods across the City of Dallas.



Feb 9, 2024














Exploring Teen Births in Dallas County Zip Codes



Maternal Health


Mapping Tool


Internal


Yearly



This mapping tool allows users to explore the areas with the highest proportions of teen births across zip codes in Dallas County.



Jan 26, 2024














CPAL Internal Metrics Dashboard



Well-Resourced Neighborhoods


Dashboard


Internal


Yearly



This shiny dashboard is an internal reference tool that can be used by CPAL team members to find organizational metrics aggregated from multiple data sources such as the American Community Survey and other administrative datasets across North Texas.



Jan 26, 2024














Exploring Poverty in Dallas



Organizational


Mapping Tool


Internal


Yearly



This mapping tool allows users to explore the areas with the highest proportions of child poverty across the City of Dallas and pinpoint specific areas of the city with high need for relief.



Jan 12, 2024














Children Affected by Poverty



Organizational


Mapping Tool


Internal


Yearly



This mapping tool allows users to define custom service areas based on administrative boundaries (census tracts or zctas) to calculate demograpgic and poverty related metrics within their custom service areas.



Jan 5, 2024














Court Observers



Housing


Fact Sheet


External


Not Updated



Court Observers is an external fact sheet serving as a link repository for students participating in the Dallas County Court Observation project. It provides students with essential information about their roles and responsibilities, along with…



Jan 5, 2024














Justice40 in Dallas County



Organizational


Web Report


Internal


Yearly



A mapping report visualizing a number of Justice40 initiative metrics for Dallas County.



Dec 15, 2023














Neighborhood Safety Dashboard



Safety


Dashboard


External


Monthly



A neighborhood centered dashboard using bcWorkshop neighborhoods where users can explore neighbohoods across the City of Dallas to learn about police incidents or 311 reports that have occurred.



Dec 8, 2023














CPAL Child Poverty Changes Report



Organizational


Web Report


Internal


Yearly



A web report collating a number of city wide metrics important to organizational goals across all Child Poverty Action Lab domain areas. Currently focused on metrics related to Child Poverty.



Dec 1, 2023














Dallas County Court Observation Report



Housing


Dashboard


Internal


Yearly



A web report visualizing eviction court case proceedings observed across Dallas County through efforts led by the Child Poverty Action Lab and aided by the SMU School of Law.



Dec 1, 2023














Community Displacement Tool



Well-Resourced Neighborhoods


Dashboard


External


Not Updated



Analysis conducted with the aid of the Charles Schwab Community Development and Investment Team in order to assess where the areas of highest risk for displacement of residents in Dallas County may be when viewed through the lens of property level…



Nov 1, 2023














RAPID Survey Report



Early Development


Web Report


Internal


Quarterly



A web report that is intended to be updated quarterly in order to visualize new survey responses from households participating in the RAPID survey. The households participating in the survey are the same throughout the course of the project…



Oct 1, 2023














Publicly Owned Land in Dallas County



Housing


Mapping Tool


Internal


Yearly



Review of all publicly owned land in the City of Dallas by owner type. Intended use is to understand how much land owned by the City of Dallas is available for development.



Aug 1, 2023














Dallas ISD Campus Housing Profiles



Housing


Dashboard


External


Yearly



This is a tool generated to give Dallas ISD information related to middle of the year moves and evictions in attendance zones for all school campuses.



Jul 1, 2023














Afterschool Landscape Tool



Well-Resourced Neighborhoods


Mapping Tool


External


Yearly



An analysis generated for Dallas Afterschool intended to aid them in understanding the current landscape of after school programming need relative to programs they currently offer.



Jun 1, 2023














North Texas Small-Area Fair Market Rent



Housing


Mapping Tool


Internal


Yearly



Comparison of current Small-Area Fair Market rent from HUD against the average rents for apartment complexes in North Texas across various bedroom sizes.



Oct 1, 2022
